dataPlaceholder.jobs.title: You don't have any jobs yet!
dataPlaceholder.jobs.description: This is where you'll see all your jobs, but to create job you must have customers and employees to accomplish them.
dataPlaceholder.requests.title: You haven't created or received any job request!
dataPlaceholder.requests.description: Once you create or recieve an RFQ from your customers it'll appear here.

dataPlaceholder.feedback.title: You did not complete any jobs to recieve feedback!
dataPlaceholder.feedback.description: As soon as you complete a job, it'll show up here. Then you can add its feedback manually or send an SMS to customer to do it. Feeback rating and remarks can be seen here.
dataPlaceholder.customers.title: You don't have any customers yet!
dataPlaceholder.customers.description: You can view and manage all your customers here. You can also import your customers (excel/csv format) from the actions button above
dataPlaceholder.products.title: Your firm don't sale any products yet!
dataPlaceholder.products.description: You can view and manage all your products here. You can also import your products (excel/csv format) from the actions button above
dataPlaceholder.services.title: You don't provide any services right now!
dataPlaceholder.services.description: Once you create services, you can see & manage them here.
dataPlaceholder.warehouses.title: You don't have any warehouses for your stock!
dataPlaceholder.warehouses.description: You can manage, transfer and monitor stock between your warehouses on this page. You can assign warehouses to your employeese and also see its activity.

introTour.complete.youDidIt: You have learned the basisc of Sapiyon!
introTour.complete.more: Here are some cool features Sapiyon has to offer:
introTour.complete.feat.sales: You can sell products and services with tasks
introTour.complete.feat.inventory: You can manage your inventory and warehouses easily
introTour.complete.feat.customFields: You can add your own columns in all data tables
introTour.complete.feat.portal: Your customers can reach you with our customer portal
introTour.complete.feat.location: You can see real time location of your employees on map
introTour.complete.feat.autoSMS: You can send Automatic SMS to your customer & employee
introTour.complete.feat.reports: You can view detailed reports about your data
introTour.complete.feat.permissions: Sapiyon has a robust access control modal for your employees
introTour.complete.feat.notifications: Sapiyon's Mobile app and real time notifications keep you & your employees up to date about their job.
introTour.complete.feat.moreToCome: And it get's better and bettery every day!
introTour.complete.reachUs: Reach us now for a live demo
introTour.complete.videos: Get upto speed with our video tutorials in less then 30 minutes
introTour.cancel.title: Sapiyon basics
introTour.cancel.dont: You're about to cancel the tour! it is highly reccomended to finish it.
introTour.cancel.time: It will only take about 5 minutes.
introTour.welcome.title: Welcome to Sapiyon
introTour.welcome.introduction: Sapiyon is a real time Task Management service. And we don't mean a simple Todo application, you can accomplish a lot more than that with its robust user and customer handling. Let's take a 5 minute tour to see how it works.
introTour.welcome.addTasks: Create a Task for a Customer and assign it to an Employee.
introTour.welcome.itsGreat: Sit back and see things happen in real time by a variety of means.
introTour.employees.title: Employees
introTour.employees.description: The entity that will accomplish the Task for your Customer.
introTour.employees.openPage: Click here to go to employees page
introTour.employees.openForm: Click here to open employee form
introTour.employees.help1-1: Enter a username (It can be email, phone or anything else).
introTour.employees.help1-2: User will use this to login
introTour.employees.help2-2: You can learn more about roles in settings
introTour.employees.help3-1: Enter a password for this user
introTour.employees.help4-1: That's it, click save and you have an employee
introTour.customers.title: Customers
introTour.customers.description: The entity that will benefit from the Task, it can be a person, a company or even just a building or place.
introTour.customers.example1: It can be somebody waiting for Pizza.
introTour.customers.example2: A client or place waiting to be visited.
introTour.customers.example3: A company expecting some cargo delivery etc.
introTour.customers.openPage: Choose Customers List from customers menu to go to customers page
introTour.customers.openForm: Click here to open customer form
introTour.customers.help2-1: Enter a customer name if customer is an individual
introTour.customers.help2-2: Enter a company name if customer is a company or business
introTour.customers.help3-1: That's it, click save and you have a customer
introTour.tasks.title: Tasks
introTour.tasks.description: Something that needs to be done. It can be assigned to an Employee.
introTour.tasks.example2: Delivering or transporting something e.g Pizza or Cargo
introTour.tasks.example3: Assignment or to-do for an Employee e.g building a house, doing a pesticide spray, visiting a client etc.
introTour.tasks.openPage: Click this button to create a task
introTour.tasks.help2-1: Enter task title, i.e what you want to do
introTour.tasks.help3-1: Assign employees to the job. (not rerquired)
introTour.tasks.help4-1: Chose a due date for the job. (not required)
introTour.tasks.help5-1: That's it, click save button to create your very fist task
appSettings.currencyDescription: Change currency used throughout the app
